member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter
member.summary: A PulseOximeter module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.Heartbeat
member.summary: Raised when the module detects a heartbeat.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.ProbeAttached
member.summary: Raised when the module detects that the probe is placed on a finger.

member.name: E:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.ProbeDetached
member.summary: Raised when the module detects that the probe is removed from a finger.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.IsProbeAttached
member.summary: Whether the PulseOximeter's probe is attached to a finger.

member.name: P:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.LastReading
member.summary: The most recent valid reading from the pulse oximeter

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.HeartbeatEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the Heartbeat event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.ProbeAttachedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the ProbeAttached event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.ProbeDetachedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the delegate used for the ProbeDetached event.
member.param: The object that raised the event.

member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.PulseOximeter.Reading
